physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water and the seashore. A couple of people can be seen standing under the trees at the lower right hand side of the photograph. Rocks and sands can be seen between the water and the trees. A roofed building can be seen in the distance, near the edge of a land mass, amidst the trees.
title_text: Katong (Singapore) Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: bodies of water (natural) seashores natural landscapes
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Katong (Singapore) Bodies of water Seashore Landscape photography Landscapes
